text: tharunya janapriyathwayen prekshaka aakarshanaya dinagath tanashath ekkayi ada hada wenne.

hitapu amathiwaraya thamata niyamitha durakathana bilata amatharawa durakathanaya wadipura bhawitha kirima nisa wayawu amathara mudala gewannayi rajya mudrana sansthawata niyoga kara athi athara ee hethuwen amathiwarayata da ema mudal rajya mudrana sansthawa magin gewimata aadhara anubala dima matha mudrana sansthawe hitapu sabhapathi jayampathi bandara hinkendata da dushanaya namathi warada sidukalayi allas ho dushana wimarshana komisama wisin mema naduwa pawara thibini.
